methods.name: AddMasterSubmixEffect
methods.doc: Adds a submix effect preset to the master submix.

methods.name: AddSourceEffectToPresetChain
methods.doc: Adds source effect entry to preset chain. Only effects the instance of the preset chain

methods.name: AddSubmixEffect
methods.doc: Adds a submix effect preset to the given submix at the end of its submix effect chain. Returns the number of submix effects.

methods.name: ClearMasterSubmixEffects
methods.doc: Clears all master submix effects.

methods.name: ClearSubmixEffectChainOverride
methods.doc: Clears all submix effect overrides on the given submix and returns it to the default effect chain.

methods.name: ClearSubmixEffects
methods.doc: Clears all submix effects on the given submix.

methods.name: Conv_AudioOutputDeviceInfoToString
GetAvailableAudioOutputDevices
methods.doc:
Gets information about all audio output devices available in the system
@param OnObtainDevicesEvent - the event to fire when the audio endpoint devices have been retrieved

methods.name: GetCurrentAudioOutputDeviceName
methods.doc:
Gets information about the currently used audio output device
@param OnObtainCurrentDeviceEvent - the event to fire when the audio endpoint devices have been retrieved

methods.name: GetMagnitudeForFrequencies
methods.doc: Retrieve the magnitudes for the given frequencies.

methods.name: GetNumberOfEntriesInSourceEffectChain
methods.doc: Returns the number of effect chain entries in the given source effect chain.

methods.name: GetPhaseForFrequencies
methods.doc: Retrieve the phases for the given frequencies.

methods.name: IsAudioBusActive
methods.doc: Queries if the given audio bus is active (and audio can be mixed to it).

methods.name: MakeFullSpectrumSpectralAnalysisBandSettings
MakeMusicalSpectralAnalysisBandSettings
MakePresetSpectralAnalysisBandSettings
PauseRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Pause recording audio, without finalizing the recording to disk. By leaving the Submix To Record field blank, you can record the master output of the game.

methods.name: PrimeSoundCueForPlayback
methods.doc: Begin loading any sounds referenced by a sound cue into the cache so that it can be played immediately.

methods.name: PrimeSoundForPlayback
methods.doc: Begin loading a sound into the cache so that it can be played immediately.

methods.name: RegisterAudioBusToSubmix
methods.doc: Registers an audio bus to a submix so the submix output can be routed to the audiobus.

methods.name: RemoveMasterSubmixEffect
methods.doc: Removes a submix effect preset from the master submix.

methods.name: RemoveSourceEffectFromPresetChain
methods.doc: Removes source effect entry from preset chain. Only affects the instance of preset chain.

methods.name: RemoveSubmixEffect
methods.doc: Removes all instances of a submix effect preset from the given submix.

methods.name: RemoveSubmixEffectAtIndex
methods.doc: Removes the submix effect at the given submix chain index, if there is a submix effect at that index.

methods.name: ReplaceSubmixEffect
methods.doc: Replaces the submix effect at the given submix chain index, adds the effect if there is none at that index.

methods.name: ResumeRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Resume recording audio after pausing. By leaving the Submix To Pause field blank, you can record the master output of the game.

methods.name: SetBypassSourceEffectChainEntry
methods.doc: Set whether or not to bypass the effect at the source effect chain index.

methods.name: SetSubmixEffectChainOverride
methods.doc: Sets a submix effect chain override on the given submix. The effect chain will cross fade from the base effect chain or current override to the new override.

methods.name: StartAnalyzingOutput
methods.doc: Start spectrum analysis of the audio output. By leaving the Submix To Analyze blank, you can analyze the master output of the game.

methods.name: StartAudioBus
methods.doc: Starts the given audio bus.

methods.name: StartRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Start recording audio. By leaving the Submix To Record field blank, you can record the master output of the game.

methods.name: StopAnalyzingOutput
methods.doc: Stop spectrum analysis.

methods.name: StopAudioBus
methods.doc: Stops the given audio bus.

methods.name: StopRecordingOutput
methods.doc: Stop recording audio. Path can be absolute, or relative (to the /Saved/BouncedWavFiles folder). By leaving the Submix To Record field blank, you can record the master output of the game.

methods.name: SwapAudioOutputDevice
TrimAudioCache
methods.doc: Trim memory used by the audio cache. Returns the number of megabytes freed.

methods.name: UnregisterAudioBusFromSubmix
methods.doc: Unregisters an audio bus that could have been registered to a submix.
